entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 2:50PM AKST until December 12 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong warm front will produce impactful snow over the northeast Gulf Coast and portions of the northern Panhandle from tonight through Monday night. Low level warm air will move in behind this front and this will result in a transition from snow to rain or a rain/snow mix from Monday afternoon through Monday night...
